org.gstreamer.lowlevel
Interface GstDateTimeAPI

All Superinterfaces:
com.sun.jna.Library
public interface GstDateTimeAPI
extends com.sun.jna.Library

GstDateTime functions A date, time and timezone structure Struct to store date, time and timezone information altogether. GstDateTime is refcounted and immutable. Date information is handled using the proleptic Gregorian calendar. Provides basic creation functions and accessor functions to its fields.
